title: Strengthening Social Problem-Solving Competencies Using Systems Thinking and Immersive Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Social sector job-linked workshop for current practitioners. Utilizes virtual collaboration spaces and simulation tools in BYOD environments

learning_goals: Learners can construct a problem-diagnosis framework by analyzing the interconnections of elements within social systems.

Learners perform 2 policy simulations within a week using system dynamics tools (e.g., Vensim) in an immersive virtual scenario (e.g., hospital infection control), identify ≥3 feedback loops, and propose improvements.
Learners can design project-based solutions in an online collaborative environment and validate them according to quantitative/qualitative evaluation criteria.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
